build.command: cd apps/desktop && if [ "${TAURI_ENABLE_BUILD:-true}" = "true" ]; then if command -v tauri >/dev/null 2>&1; then tauri build; else echo '❌ Tauri CLI not found; install it or set TAURI_ENABLE_BUILD=false to skip'; exit 1; fi; else echo 'ℹ️ TAURI_ENABLE_BUILD set to false; skipping desktop build'; fi

options.command: cd apps/desktop && if [ "${TAURI_ENABLE_BUILD:-true}" = "true" ]; then if command -v tauri >/dev/null 2>&1; then tauri build; else echo '❌ Tauri CLI not found; install it or set TAURI_ENABLE_BUILD=false to skip'; exit 1; fi; else echo 'ℹ️ TAURI_ENABLE_BUILD set to false; skipping desktop build'; fi
